cleaned_text: in order to get really cool tips from this community i suggest you explain exactly what you did that led to the detection the reality is that some people understand how to use these tools to cheat and some dont its not rocket science but you have to take the perspective of your professor or teacher to figure out how to actually leverage the capabilities of these tools these are my general ideas for cheating in a way that is both ethical and practical <number> first realize this even if you circumvent the detection theres a good chance that your teacher or professor might suspect you cheated if they get the subtle feeling that something is not right this could lead them to question your knowledge on the subject and test you in person to see whether or not you understand what you wrote if you want to cheat you have to make them believe that you did the work yourself <number> consider discussing the use of ai with your teacher or professor theres no reason why any teacher should prohibit the use of ai there are many ways to use them that are not cheating this includes spell checking grammar checking formatting help etc in the case of formatting ai can use markdown language to quickly create the correct formatting of headings lists etc also typographical errors can be fixed such as the wrong use of different typographically similar quotes ai can help you quickly understand complex concepts as you read about them when you read material you may use ai to input parts of the text and have it explain it for you in different ways this way ai actually teaches you something you may then discuss the topics youve learned with your teacher to see if you got it right before actually writing about it that way your teacher can see that youre a learner and not a cheater and that you realize the importance of learning good ai practices that will boost learning <number> dont use just one ai tool while chatgpt is good for writing logically coherent paragraphs google gemini is good for reasoning about complex issues have them cooperate to build your knowledge and texts really quickly <number> if you have a smartphone i recommend writing parts of your texts on the bus in your bed or wherever this makes your brain actually master the most important parts of your texts and creates a feeling in you that you are actually doing some of the work specifically if youre an iphone user i recommend using the native keyboard and turning on all the writing help features in settings this way youre using exceptionally advanced handheld ai to boost your writing the text predictions of the iphone native keyboard are insane if you really analyze how it works if you write grammatically correct coherent paragraphs the keyboard actually knows what the text is about and some of the word predictions are eerily accurate and relevant when the text deals with a very specific topic <number> for this one i need to declare that i pay for both chatgpt plus and google gemini advanced each of them is <number> bucks a month or so so im not biased in this sense anyway you dont have to start with chatgpt google gemini is actually better at creating meaningful and interesting outlines and suggesting improvements chatgpt is for well actually gemini is better for cheating thats the truth chatgpt however might be used to explain things to you format text summarize and structure data etc but not for the actual cheating this is not my opinion its a fact <number> if you use gemini from a computer you can basically write highquality texts by selecting parts of its output and typing in a box that appears if you type eg explain and hit enter gemini will expand that specific part of the text ie what you selected and replace it with longer sentences or even whole paragraphs that make the text incorporate your request this way you can avoid writing stuff you dont understand like its impossible to not understand the text if you do this repeatedly in my opinion this specific feature is the most potent learning tool i have ever seen its probably underestimated <number> know that these tools are not currently able to create a list of references they inevitably cheat themselves by making up references you cant trick them i believe they are not built to actually cheat therefore they are very good at mimicking correct referencing and citation but they cant provide the sources and cite them for you they cant provide sources for the information they provide because they didnt use sources to find out what to write they simply knew it and they are not equipped with the ability to understand why they know something this is a fundamental insight that you have to have in order to cheat successfully theres a good chance that cheating is detected by realizing that the students bibliography didnt really match the contents of the text this is what can be detected as other people have pointed out theres no way to detect ai use to write a text however its easy to spot a cheater if the task was to read something and then write about it and the student hasnt even handled the files that held the information they refer to <number> chat with the chats this is what they are best at if you actually chat with them about your work in an intelligent way together you could come up with great content they could suggest search queries or works to look into this way you can go find the sources that they suggest manually and then simply upload the sources and have them write the text for you only using the content found in these sources when doing this make sure to explicitly instruct them not to search the web and only use the files you provided andimportantlyalways tell them to quote the material so you can manually check that the information actually exists in the material heres a pro tip if you create a custom gpt you can upload lots of sources to it and uncheck the option search the web this will ensure that the custom gpt only uses the uploaded material <number> when you build a text especially if it has many parts work with one part of the text at the time but always let the models know the context so if your work is <number> pages long work with one page at a time but first pasteupload the entire text so that the model knows what its all about context is always key when working which these language models they are built to understand things <number> continuously let the models summarize your texts to do this always create a new chat first upload or paste your text and ask it to explain or summarize the text pro tip always do this two times in two different chats in one of the chats you state that the work is anothers and in the other chat you state that the work is yours the reply you get will will sometimes heavily depend on what context the model works with if its your texts it will be more likely to find ways to improve the work if it thinks that someone else wrote it it will obviously not suggest improvements rather it will focus on a deeper analysis finding different ways to interpret and understand the text good luck i think if you cheat the correct way you actually learn more and become a better writer then if you dont
